Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: At Kingston Care Connect, your privacy is not an afterthoughtâ€”it's our core architecture.

points.noTracking: No Tracking: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixels, or any third-party trackers.
points.noCookies: No Cookies: We do not store personal data in cookies. We use a single essential cookie only to remember your language preference.
points.noLogging: No Query Logging: Your search terms are processed anonymously and are not linked to your identity.
